short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically tile your browser windows to maximise your screen space.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Tiling Window Manager" is a helpful little tool that automatically organizes your browser windows into a neat, tiled layout. Enable "Tile Windows Automatically" in the extension popup and your windows will be arranged according to your preferred layoutâ€”opt for a focused "master window" layout with one larger window or evenly distributed "even tiles". Any new windows you create will be added to your tiled arrangement. Requires a one-time payment.

Key Features:
- Automatic Tiling: As you open new browser windows, they will be tiled according to your layout preferences, maximizing your screen space without manual adjustment.
- Choose a Layout: Choose between "master window" or "even tiles" to fit your working style. The layout adapts to your screen size and orientation.
- Window Spacing: Toggle spaces between windows with the "Window Spacing" option.
- Multi-Monitor Support: Each display is treated independently.
